comments:
In the GLA adapter editor, under 3.0m8, selecting a component in the context 
implementation and then browsing for a unique ID (from the configuration 
section) throws a null pointer exception.  There also appears to be a 
graphical resource missing, but this shouldn't be a related issue.

Stack trace:
